attributes.action: Test all NHS frontline staff who have potential symptoms of COVID-19.
attributes.additional_details: Testing of symptomatic NHS staff is essential in order to protect vulnerable people in need of healthcare and ensure NHS staffing is maximised.
attributes.background: The government should immediately implement priority testing for all NHS frontline staff if they have symptoms of COVID-19. Anyone who has come into contact with those who test positive can then be traced to reduce further transmission.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304005.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
